mobopacity.config.title: Mob Opacity Config
mobopacity.config.isenabled.tooltip: Controls whether or not to enable opacity changes
mobopacity.config.opacity.tooltip: Controls the opacity of the %s mob
mobopacity.config.armouropacity.tooltip: Controls the opacity of armour pieces on all mobs
mobopacity.config.itemopacity.tooltip: Controls the opacity of held item (both offhand and mainhand) on all mobs
